name: xThemeSong
overview: Download theme songs from YouTube or upload custom MP3s for your media library
description: A plugin that automatically downloads theme songs from YouTube by user provided video ID/URL or allows uploading custom MP3 files. Features complete Web UI with drag-and-drop upload, audio player for existing themes, loading animations, delete functionality, tabbed settings page, and media library overview with bulk URL assignment.
changelog: v1.1.0: Enhanced UI - tabbed settings page, improved Media Library overview with inline audio players, bulk YouTube URL assignment, better table styling.
